text: Not so dusty, she might say afterwards, drawing at a cigarette. It's a wow! he said. She kissed him motherly: You just wait till you teach the girl you really love. He said: Will that be better? She nodded:
handwritten_text: Not so dusty, she might say afterwards, drawing at a cigarette. It's a wow! he said. She kissed him motherly: You just wait till you teach the girl you really love. He said: Will that be better? She nodded:
